name: Schnapsbrennerei Innerummerland
description:
Distillery Innerummerland - Tasting & farmgate sales
    
On the family farm liquor is burned for 300 years.
Attend a schnapps tasting and learn about the distillate from the production to the tasting.
The Innerummerland distillery is on the scenic Zillertal Höhenstraße. This means a visit to the distillery is ideal for combining with an excursion.
Many of the schnapps made at the distillery have won prizes.
The distillery is open for visits on enquiry.
Sales ans tastings possible at all times, guided tours available on request.
Best time to visit is all year around.
Groups are welcome with advance booking.
